text: Bob is the surname of: * Adam Bob (1967–2019), American football player * Camille Bob (1937–2015), American rhythm and blues singer and musician * Fernando Bob (born 1988), Brazilian footballer also known as Bob * Hans- Ekkehard Bob (1917–2013), German World War II fighter ace * Ioan Bob, Bishop of Făgăraş of the Romanian Greek Catholic Church from 1783 to 1830 * Jim Bob, member of Carter the Unstoppable Sex Machine ==See also== * Bobb, a surname (and given name)
title: Bob (surname)
